updates.contents: The maintenance is now complete; API is fully operational.
updates.title: Scheduled API Maintenance

updates.contents: The API is currently unavailable for maintenance. It will be available again by 5:30 PDT (00:30 UTC).
updates.title: Scheduled API Maintenance

updates.contents:
The Cloud Foundry API is scheduled for maintenance starting Wednesday, August 8 at 5pm PDT, for approximately 30 minutes (August 9 00:00 UTC). 

During this time, the Cloud Foundry API, command line tools and web interface are going to be unavailable.

Running apps will not be affected.
updates.title: Scheduled API Maintenance: Wednesday, August 8 from 5:00pm to 5:30pm PDT (August 9 00:00 UTC)
